reviews.review: Amazing! This game is practically my childhood

I have been wanting to play this game for ages but never got around to it. The game came around my birthday so i haven’t thought about buying it. But because it was on sale for something incredibly cheap and because I wanted to be a pc “old timer” who compares game to how they were 14 years ago. So I picked it up started playing it and immediately got immersed in the amazing world. I don’t think I will play a game like this ever again in my life because it was such a pure experience. No cutscenes (I think there was one but it was waking up) and some really pure gun play with good ai. The ai does things unexpected that throws you off and the puzzles can sometime leave you pondering but I have never gotten stuck. The characters and story were intriguing and objects related to the world I sometimes looked up they purpose (which always was logical) because I’d played gmod for so long but never played half-life I kept discovering the characters purpose personality and objects perpuse. It was so interesting and yet not boring even though the game is old you can still play the game because the graphics may look like shit but the game is surtanly the opposite.
Really nice game, would recommend buying
Milion years after release it's still amazing and it will forver be....now where is HL3?!?!?!?

This game is a work of art. Some people say it's awful, I love it. It was the first Valve game I played when I found the Orange Box for PS3 in my local EB Games. I then found a disk that contained Half-Life 1, Half-Life Blue Shift, and Half-Life Opposing Force. I put it in my old 2012 computer ant that put me on a path to greatness. six, almost seven years later, I play this game and get a wave of memories from sitting on my couch, and walking through the train station for the first time.
Hl 2 просто не нуждается в представлении вышла в 2004, а до сих пор играбельна и даже лучше многих нынешних проектов. 10 молчаливых монтировок из 10

Half-life 2, как много в этих словах, игра-шедевр, прорыв в игровой индустрии и лучшая игра 2004 года. И ведь не поспоришь. Графика, физика, проработка сюжета, диалоги(монологи) и персонажи заставят многих игроков перепройти эту игру. По сути перед нами обычный шутер от первого лица, но стоит лишь окунуться, в эту довольно мрачную атмосферу антиутопии...
Одна из самых величайших игр в истории, которой так и не суждено получить завершение. Помним, любим, скорбим.

I waited so long to play this game, almost 15 years.
After enjoying so much the first episode and after hearing all the fuss about people waiting for a 3rd game, the disapointment is as big as the wait. I now don't care if Half Life 3 comes out one day or not. 

I played all the game waiting for "THE" moment where I could enjoy playing the game and not complain about everything I could face (bad AI, poor level design, lousy puzzles). I've waited all the game to hear me say : "Oh yeah ! Now this is so great". I've hated to drive vehicules. I found the levels boring and painfull to cross (in terms of entertainment, not difficulty). Only fun thing is near the end of the game when [spoiler]the zero gravity gun is more powerfull. But its only the last level and for a short amount of time.[/spoiler] 

It's clearly not as immersive as the first game and the element of surprise of the first game has vannished. 

But maybe I shouldn't waited so long ?
Anyway, this goes straight in the top list of my biggest video-game deceptions of all time...

Для меня Half-life 2 одна из тех игр, к которой приятно возвращаться. Даже несмотря на то, что история завершилась на клиффхэнгере с многоточием, хочется пережить это приключение ещё раз, а потом ещё раз и ещё раз. Вновь встретиться с полюбившимися персонажами, Отцом Григорием, робопсом, Илаем, доктором Кляйнером, Джудит, Барни и, конечно же, обаятельной Аликс Вэнс. Постойте, кажется, я кого то забыл. … Ламарр! Негодница. Куда же ты опять запропастилась?

The grandfather (after Half-Life) of FPS games. If it would be possible, I would rate it 10 stars. Half-Life re-created the meaning of FPS, and opened a new chapter in the FPS world. Many tried to copy it back in 1998, as well as in 2004. None of them made it like Valve.
I have been playing the entire franchise for over 10 years and will do so forever. The one and only game that has magically caught me inside its universe.

Edit:
Here I am in 2021 updating my review. I have nominated this game for "labor of love" because Valve released a random patch for it to get it ready for Steam Deck. It's broken for me on my desktop when I try to play it at 4K. It launches in a tiny window, and if I click on anything the menu goes offscreen and won't let me interact with it. (I have no other monitors.)

Original review
Here I am in 2018 writing a mini-review for this game that I have nominated because I am required to do so for a badge. I'm like a trained circus bee and am definitely not doing this half-heartedly. No, no, no.

Half-Life 2 is an environmental storytelling masterclass, and is so much fun with a robot--if you like playing catch with a robot. I guess. I mean, most fun with a robot is high on how everyone ranks their personal gaming satisfaction... right? It also ends in a cliffhanger ending. In hindsight, this should have been a warning sign for Episodes One and Two, which do the same thing with their endings.

Half-Life 2 is also a great on-rails shooter, mainly because it manages to make the player feel like they are in the middle of an action movie and do so via great level design and pacing. The voice acting and lip syncing are still top notch.

The graphics are aging, and the engine makes some people motion sick. I've still never figured that one out. The developer has also abandoned the game, so don't look for much support from them if you have a problem. But if you missed out, this is basically the A New Hope of early 2000's video gaming.

Now gibs me dat 25 Steam exp or whatever it is.

I can see how Half Life 2 was good for its time but I wont give it extra credit for that. Getting past the motion sickness by increasing the FOV from 75 to 90 and using 1360 resolution made it playable and I actually enjoyed it from then on. Graphics are old, story is interesting. Weapons and items are whatever. Pretty much had a run and gun through the levels with music playing on youtube. Could have cared less for the charaters. Would recommend but after reaching chapter sewers I decided I didnt really care what happens so uninstalled.
Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia.
No wonder this game is a classic.  Didn't get around to playing it until 2018, and it's still unbelievable. Loads of fun!
